body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Cox Horton. Father of Henry Horton, Travis Horton, Rees Horton, William Horton, Phebe Horton, Amanda Horton, and Rebecca E. Horton. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.
